events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role in our development team and look forward to reviewing your qualifications.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, focusing on software developer positions as per your skillset.
A recruiter specialized in software engineering recruitment has been assigned to your case and will reach out to you shortly.
The initial screening of your resume and experience has been completed successfully, and you qualify to proceed to the technical interview stage.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th, 2024, at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly and ensure your environment is ready.
